metadata.name: That Last and Final Moment Is Yours
metadata.description:
Oil paint on board, painted by my dad, original design by me based on the classical Vanitas style.

NFT comes with the 1/1 original painting, hand signed by us both.

Originally minted on Opensea, and sold to 'mxdmediamasters' for 1ETH on October 14th 2021. Now migrated to 'Harvmcm 1/1s', Harvmcm's own smart contract.
